package.name: cross-busybox-musl
package.unpack: tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/busybox-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/busybox-${PKGVERSION}.config busybox-${PKGVERSION}/.config sed -i 's/# CONFIG_AR is not set/CONFIG_AR=y/g' busybox-${PKGVERSION}/.config # sed -i 's/CONFIG_BRCTL=y/# CONFIG_BRCTL is not set/g' busybox-${PKGVERSION}/.config
package.build: export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-ia32-musl/bin:$PATH cd busybox-${PKGVERSION} ARCH=x86 CROSS_COMPILE="i386-linux-musl-" make oldconfig ARCH=x86 CROSS_COMPILE="i386-linux-musl-" make ARCH=x86 CROSS_COMPILE="i386-linux-musl-" make install
package.install: if [ -f busybox-${PKGVERSION}/busybox ] ; then mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/staticstuff tar cvjf ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/staticstuff/busybox-static-musl-i686-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 busybox-${PKGVERSION} fi
